title: Missing summoner icon
body:
I'm missing the Team Turquality icon that I purchased

https://gyazo.com/24cd703bb28c1b7181e0277e252dbefd

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, but I wasn't able to locate any purchase for that icon.  The icon you linked is also for 2016 but the store has 2017 icons.  If you can provide any clarification I'd be happy to look further.  Thanks!

In my purchase history there's a tsm 2013 icon that I never bought (and that isn't available for me to choose). 

I think my icon disappeared after that showed up?

We'll be happy to take a closer look individually with you and offer more context.  Reach out to us in a ticket and include the specific content you believe are to be missing.  Our Billing team can take a look at your purchases and figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you!
